title: RBI clears KVS Manian's appointment as MD & CEO of Federal Bank
description: The bank stated that Krishnan Venkat Subramanian (KVS) will join the bank on September 23, 2024, a day after Shyam Srinivasan ends his term at the south-based bank. He served the bank as MD and CEO for 14 years. Manian resigned from Kotak Mahindra Bank on April 30 after serving the bank for 29 years.
